projects.name: Lexi – Smart Emotional Robot (Under Development)
projects.description: An interactive emotional robot that expresses different moods using an OLED display, buzzer tones, and RGB lighting. Built with ESP32 and designed for responsive interactions using ultrasonic sensors and touch.
projects.technologies: ESP32, Arduino IDE, C++, OLED, Buzzer, RGB LED, Ultrasonic Sensor, Touch Sensor

projects.name: Morse Code Decoder
projects.description: An Arduino-based project that lets users input Morse code using two buttons and displays the decoded characters on an OLED screen.
projects.technologies: Arduino IDE, C++, U8g2lib, Buttons, OLED

projects.name: Bus Safety Project
projects.description: A system that detects seat occupancy in school buses to ensure no student is left behind. Uses sensors on seats and an ultrasonic scanner for final checks.
projects.technologies: Arduino IDE, C++, OneSheeld, Sensors, Ultrasonic Scanner

projects.name: Multi-Game Hub
projects.description: A handheld ESP32-based gaming device with OLED display and multiple simple games like Rock-Paper-Scissors and Guess the Number.

projects.name: ViVision
projects.description: Wi-Fi color detection system using TCS34725 sensor and ESP8266 that serves real-time RGB values on a web interface.
projects.technologies: ESP8266, Arduino IDE, C++, TCS34725, Web Interface

projects.name: DarkStrike (Under Testing)
projects.description: An ESP32-based tool for Wi-Fi security testing, featuring deauthentication and Evil Twin attacks through OLED menu navigation.
projects.technologies: ESP32, Arduino IDE, C++, OLED, Wi-Fi Security
